Smart Belt is a tool that aims to assist families and geriatric caregivers in the supervision and care of people of the third age or with chronic and severe diseases that require it.
Smart Belt is an app linked to the special Smart Belt belt, in order for the person in charge / caregiver to carry out all the settings, records, administration and supervision of their functions, including: personal account management , medical history log, medication log and administration, pending medical studies and inquiries, scheduled alarms and reminders, belt location map display, and general system settings.
